snippet: Isaiah Thomas scored 28 points against his former team, and the Boston Celtics held off the Phoenix Suns 102-99 despite almost blowing a 21-point lead Saturday night....
lead_paragraph: Isaiah Thomas scored 28 points against his former team, and the Boston Celtics held off the Phoenix Suns 102-99 despite almost blowing a 21-point lead Saturday night.

headline.main: Thomas Scores 28, Leads Celtics Over Suns 102-99
headline.print_headline: Thomas Scores 28, Leads Celtics Over Suns 102-99
